title: Janna is now at a 61% win rate
body:
https://lolalytics.com/ranked/worldwide/current/platinum/plus/champion/Janna/

Currently 19k games aggregated after patch 7.19 and she's sitting at a 61% win rate.

Simple solution would've been to nerf coin, ardent and her shield duration but I guess you like to make things more complicated than they should be.

Slapping cdr on to Spellthiefs did nothing btw.


Edit: 20k games, 59% now.

Edit 2: Hot fixed.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/gikJEw03-janna-hotfix-context

replies.body: simple solution actually is ban her :P

> [{quoted}](name=Dashing Charmer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LA52vM2z,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-27T17:42:13.912+0000)
>
> simple solution actually is ban her :P

banning shouldnt be a long term solution to deal with OP champ

> [{quoted}](name=Zone of Endless,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LA52vM2z,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2017-09-27T17:44:27.096+0000)

> banning shouldnt be a long term solution to deal with OP champ

Kass
Season 1-5, it worked alright. 90% ban rate

> [{quoted}](name=xJLx MCHammer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LA52vM2z,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2017-09-27T19:38:40.373+0000)
>
> Kass
> Season 1-5, it worked alright. 90% ban rate

I said banning Shouldn't be a long term solution to deal with OP champ not that it doesn't work.

Riot is just making it easier for people to choose their bans. Quit being ungrateful!

######/s
it's the start of a long term solution. See what happened to yasuo? riot said maybe we should rework him. Ban janna enough and riot will be like hmmm maybe there's a problem.

three options:

1) nerf janna now


2) mildly nerf coin, buff spellthief to make it viable (Young Generation played spellthief lulu and actually won against coin which amazed me, can't remember the last time that happened)

3) redesign the support items
https://i.gyazo.com/6a6345ef28a135b206ee2c03e095dee5.png go ahead, buff spellthiefs hehe
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/facebook/001/012/092/f36.jpg
Back away foul demon! That combo should be tossed into the depths for eternity.

> [{quoted}](name=Penns,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LA52vM2z,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2017-09-27T18:22:52.422+0000)
>
> https://i.gyazo.com/6a6345ef28a135b206ee2c03e095dee5.png go ahead, buff spellthiefs hehe

okay well maaaaaaaaybe just nerf coin then :P

what wouldn't surprise me: Riot has now cornered supports down to a single SS, exhaust, and you can't buy support items unless you take exhaust. because THAT makes sense
**PLEASE** wait atleast a day before you start complaining about Janna.

> [{quoted}](name=Fairyfleur,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LA52vM2z,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2017-09-27T19:05:23.753+0000)
>
> **PLEASE** wait atleast a day before you start complaining about Janna.

PRe sure Janna's been complained about for the last 7 months.

{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
She had some pretty massive changes; it's best to wait a few days for the winrate to even out before you can analyze it.

> [{quoted}](name=Fairyfleur,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LA52vM2z,comment-id=000800000000,timestamp=2017-09-27T19:14:22.489+0000)
>
> She had some pretty massive changes; it's best to wait a few days for the winrate to even out before you can analyze it.

If it's still staying above 57% wr after 20,000 games it's still too strong lololol.
So it goes down by 2% every hour? Dude, are you insane, soon it will be reaching release-bard level winrates. {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

> [{quoted}](name=0 oxros piratis,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LA52vM2z,comment-id=00080000000000000001,timestamp=2017-09-27T19:58:20.724+0000)
>
> So it goes down by 2% every hour? Dude, are you insane, soon it will be reaching release-bard level winrates. {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

Winrates on weaker champs are supposed to drop rapidly if they were inherently stronger the patch before, not sit where they were originally at for 20,000+ games and then bounce up a bit then go back to the same exact location.


This is extremely noticeable when you compare it to champs like Nunu/Ivern/Jhin/Varus/Zac/Malzahar/Graves/Gragas/Hecarim/Maokai/Rengar/Lulu/Thresh/Tahm Kench/Leblanc/Ahri/Yasuo/Taliyah/Cass/Azir/Ryze/Shaco/Yi/Lee Sin/Caitlyn(( Whose now at a 44% wr from a 55% wr btw, and it dropped significantly within the first day.))

So yeah, I highly doubt Janna out of all the champions is just going  gradually dip down to 49% wr after 800,000 games. After about 20,000-30,000 games if she's sitting at a 55-6% winrate she's going to stay at a 55-56% wr which means the nerfs effectively did nothing, and actually probably buffed her in the long run.
thats a pretty small sample im giving it till friday before i make any kind of decision
Also just checked according to lolking janna is at a 53% winrate not a 61%
MUH CIRCLEJERK

I don't know why the forums are like this. You can't just nerf a support item, since there are literally only 3 to choose from. Janna isn't the only one who uses ancient coin. Same with {{item:3504}} . Ap supports use these items, maybe instead of nerfing supports again there should be a focus on being more interactive like say {{champion:497}} ?
Absolutely love Rakan. Play him tank, you cant kill him, play him ap, you cant kill his allies, play him actives, wombo combos

Right, except coin is bought on every support, no exceptions.

There's literally no options, it's crowding out options.

> [{quoted}](name=TSM Piccaboo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LA52vM2z,comment-id=00110001,timestamp=2017-09-28T02:33:30.235+0000)
>
> Right, except coin is bought on every support, no exceptions.

Ok, dude I get you're trying to make a point... but that's simply a lie.
Janna cock blocks Kat so hard, what are you smoking?
ardent and janna buffs certainly did not help

Ardent was never buffed, they removed the on-hit heal.

They might have made it scale better and added the functionality of the buff to the user, but this was still a net nerf to the item.

Its Riot's hard-on to buff a champion when they nerf them, which usually ends up being a net gain for the champion. This was one case WHERE SHE WAS JUST STRONG ACROSS THE BOARD AND DIDNT NEED COMPENSATION.
She needed to be _changed_, not just nerfed. She gained some interactivity, while they nerfed the more offensive parts of her kit.

Wish they would do this to other champs instead of dumpstering them. 
But riot loves their cancer botlanes. 
adcs and enchanter supps are never allowed to just get nerfed.

They did remove non-Janna enchanters from the game at one point.

It was a dark time for support players when pre-season 4 launched.
Soraka says hi.
Guess I'm a part of that 39%. I can't get a win with her post-update for shit.

Can we let the meta change before kneecapping a symptom champion? Janna doesnt need to be Sejuani'ed.

We are at a short time away from new season and likely new meta with massive game-wide changes along the way, nerfing Janna _now_ its silly and ridiculous.
We really doing this again? We really making a jump judgement on a Champion's state less than 2 days after she got major power shifts in her kit? You don't see any problem with this?

Janna has a win rate 58.91% for Platinum+ players 

i clicked on the link you provided and its shows that win rate not 61% and oh since the patch hasnt been out a full day yet... the #s are gonna change alot as you check it... and also the sample size so far is limited... 

just lets see a day or two in

> [{quoted}](name=jwebb0113,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LA52vM2z,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-09-27T17:57:33.269+0000)
>
> Janna has a win rate 58.91% for Platinum+ players 
> 
> i clicked on the link you provided and its shows that win rate not 61% and oh since the patch hasnt been out a full day yet... the #s are gonna change alot as you check it... and also the sample size so far is limited... 
> 
> just lets see a day or two in

Okey, AND?! 57.91% winrate HELLO?

jwebb0113 (NA)  - 3 minutes ago
now at 230 pm checking the same source again

her win rate is at 57.54%

so you said was 61%, then it dropped to 58.66 at 2pm on my previous comment to this. and 30 mins later as more games have been played its dropped again to 57.54%

so since your post her win rate has gone down 3.5%

like i said give a moment... see how it ends up settling. cuz as the day goes and she is played in more games it will change. im not saying she dont need to be addressed im just saying dont have knee jerk reactions

Look at the first graph and in case you didn't see scroll down and look at the right it literally says 


"League of Legends Patch 7.19

Last 7 Days Platinum+ Players

19,162

Janna Games Analyzed

Current Patch 7.19 Matches Only"

Also 19k games is a fair sample size to how things will trend out at that point.

> [{quoted}](name=TSM Piccaboo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LA52vM2z,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-09-27T17:58:15.151+0000)
>
> Look at the first graph

look at the over all win rate... for this patch only which is 58.91% 

https://imgur.com/a/fJ1io
That's the starting point where she was at at the beginning of the day, look over to 9/28 because that's where she stands atm and at the end of this day and that will be used as a indicator.

now at 230 pm checking the same source again

her win rate is at 57.54% 

so you said was 61%, then it dropped to 58.66 at 2pm on my previous comment to this. and 30 mins later as more games have been played its dropped again to 57.54% 

so since your post her win rate has gone down 3.5%
That's around the same time the hot fix went live.

and as i type this reply its is now at 56.8% win rate 

so like i said just give a moment to settle before losing your shit and knee jerk reaction .

so from 61% to 56.8% .... in a few hours time when the amount of games played has nearly doubled

Right because she was.. y'know.. _hotfixed_ 

Also I wasn't "losing my shit" maybe you should change your tone of reading. If anything I play Janna pretty frequently and would love to play my champion again without it being perma.

once again... lets wait and see how her #s settle after the patch is out. 

right now its down to 57.35% as of today when the op made his post it was 61% so just as of today as more games have been played janna's win rate for this patch( today) has dropped ... 

once there is a day or two , three out with the changes and then make a judgement on her rework/nerfs
Singed didn't even have 10 hours before he got hotfixed with sejuani. But hey its janna.

hey guess what janna got a hot fix a lil bit ago ... 

post made by riot
